description: A component that searches for tools using SearXNG.

url.info: The base URL of your SearXNG instance (e.g., http://localhost:8080).

max_results.info: Maximum number of search results to return.

categories.info: Search categories to include (e.g., general, images, news).

tool_description:
A tool that searches using SearXNG.
The available categories are: {categories}

success.tool_created: SearXNG search tool created for {url} with max {max_results} results

warnings.empty_query: Search query is empty. Please provide a search term.
warnings.no_results: No search results found for query: '{query}'

errors.connection_failed: Failed to connect to SearXNG instance at {url}: {error}
errors.search_request_failed: Search request failed with status code: {status}
errors.search_connection_failed: Failed to connect to SearXNG for search: {error}
errors.url_required: SearXNG URL is required. Please provide a valid URL.
errors.tool_creation_failed: Failed to create SearXNG search tool: {error}
